      • getTag

        public <T extends SAMTag> T getTag​(SAMTagEnum tag)

        Get a standard SAM tag from the record.

        Method allows to get a particular standard tag:
        MD tag = getTagValue(SAMTagEnum.MD)
        Type Parameters:
        T - SAM tag type to return (i.e. 'MD')
        Parameters:
        tag - SAM tag id to return
        Returns:
        SAM tag or null if no tag found.

      • getTag

        public SAMTag getTag​(String tag)

        Get a SAM tag from the record.

        Parameters:
        tag - the name of the SAM tag to get
        Returns:
        the SAM tag or null if no tag found

      • setTag

        public <T extends SAMTag> T setTag​(T tag)

        Set the SAM tag and get back the replaced one.

        Type Parameters:
        T - SAM tag type to be set (i.e. 'MD')
        Parameters:
        tag - SAM tag to be set
        Returns:
        replaced SAM tag or null in no tag was found

      • removeTag

        public <T extends SAMTag> T removeTag​(SAMTagEnum tag)

        Remove a standard SAM tag from the record.

        Method allows to remove a particular standard tag:
        MD tag = removeTag(SAMTagEnum.MD)
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        tag - SAM tag id to remove
        Returns:
        SAM tag or null if no tag found.

        public CIGAR getCIGAROperations()

      • getAlignment

        public String getAlignment()
        Reconstructs the reference sequence the read is aligned to. The upper case letters are exact ref matching, while lower case ones are from the read and may be used to calculate the consent from various reads.
        Returns:
        the reconstructed reference sequence
